methods.contract:
This contracts the source from a pair of `LongChunk` and `Chunk` and produces a `Chunk`. The returned
 chunk is owned by the caller.

Note: Java generics information - <T,A extends io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Attributes.Any>

:param source: io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Chunk<A>
:param perElementLengthDest: io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.IntChunk<io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Attributes.ChunkPositions>
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.WritableObjectChunk<T,A>) a result chunk of T[]
methods.expand:
This expands the source from a `T[]` per element to a flat `T` per element. The kernel records the number of
 consecutive elements that belong to a row in `perElementLengthDest`. The returned chunk is owned by the caller.

Note: Java generics information - <T,A extends io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Attributes.Any>

:param source: io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.WritableObjectChunk<T,A>
:param perElementLengthDest: io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.WritableIntChunk<io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Attributes.ChunkPositions>
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.WritableChunk<A>) an unrolled/flattened chunk of T
